languages.text: "Зря. Стоило начать с этого, пока у тебя еще был пистолет". {n}Вам удается вцепиться в оружие бродяги и отвести его в сторону. Некоторое время вы, рыча, боретесь...{/n}

"Bad move. Shoulda led with that while you still had your pistol." {n}You manage to grab the beggar's weapon and turn it away from you. The two of you struggle for a time, grunting with the effort...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Зря. Стоило начать с этого, пока у тебя еще был пистолет". {n}Вам удается вцепиться в оружие бродяги и отвести его в сторону. Некоторое время вы, рыча, боретесь...{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bad move. Shoulda lead with that while you still had your pistol." {n}You manage to grab the vagabond's weapon and turn it away from you. The two of you struggle and grunt for a while...{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: 「残念だったな。ピストルが手にあるうちに撃つべきだった」{n}あなたはなんとか乞食の武器をつかみ、押しのける。2人は、しばらくうめき声をあげながら格闘する…{/n}
languages.original_text: "Bad move. Shoulda led with that while you still had your pistol." {n}You manage to grab the beggar's weapon and turn it away from you. The two of you struggle for a time, grunting with the effort...{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「残念だったな。ピストルが手にあるうちに撃つべきだった」{n}あなたはなんとか乞食の武器をつかみ、押しのける。2人は、しばらくうめき声をあげながら格闘する…{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: “你可真蠢，你应该趁着手里还有枪的时候开枪。”{n}你一把抓住了乞丐手里的枪，把它扭到了别的方向。你们两个扭作一团，厮打了一会儿……{/n}
languages.original_text: "Bad move. Shoulda led with that while you still had your pistol." {n}You manage to grab the beggar's weapon and turn it away from you. The two of you struggle for a time, grunting with the effort...{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你可真蠢，你应该趁着手里还有枪的时候开枪。”{n}你一把抓住了乞丐手里的枪，把它扭到了别的方向。你们两个扭作一团，厮打了一会儿……{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: «Mala jugada. Debería haberlo pensado mientras aún tenía su pistola». {n}Consigues agarrar el arma del mendigo y alejarla de ti. Los dos forcejeáis durante un rato, gruñendo por el esfuerzo...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Bad move. Shoulda led with that while you still had your pistol." {n}You manage to grab the beggar's weapon and turn it away from you. The two of you struggle for a time, grunting with the effort...{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mala jugada. Debería haberlo pensado mientras aún tenía su pistola». {n}Consigues agarrar el arma del mendigo y alejarla de ti. Los dos forcejeáis durante un rato...{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: "Keine gute Idee. Das hättet Ihr machen sollen, als Ihr Eure Pistole noch hattet." {n}Es gelingt dir, die Waffe des Bettlers zu packen und von dir wegzudrehen. Keuchend vor Anstrengung ringt ihr eine Weile miteinander ...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Bad move. Shoulda led with that while you still had your pistol." {n}You manage to grab the beggar's weapon and turn it away from you. The two of you struggle for a time, grunting with the effort...{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Keine gute Idee. Das hättet Ihr mal machen sollen, als Ihr Eure Pistole noch hattet." {n}Es gelingt dir, die Waffe des Bettlers zu packen und von dir wegzudrehen. Ihr zwei kämpft eine Weile grunzend miteinander ...{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: « C'est mal joué, ça. Vous auriez dû commencer par là quand vous aviez encore votre flingue. » {n}Vous parvenez à saisir l'arme du mendiant et à la détourner de votre visage. Une lutte féroce s'engage...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Bad move. Shoulda led with that while you still had your pistol." {n}You manage to grab the beggar's weapon and turn it away from you. The two of you struggle for a time, grunting with the effort...{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est mal joué, ça. Vous auriez dû commencer par là quand vous aviez encore votre pistolet. » {n}Vous parvenez à saisir l'arme du mendiant et à la détourner de votre visage. Une lutte féroce s'engage...{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: "Hata ediyorsun. Bunu tabancan hâlâ elindeyken yapmalıydın." {n}Dilencinin silahını tutup başka tarafa çevirmeyi başarıyorsun. Bir süre boğuşuyorsunuz, homurdanarak dövüşüyorsunuz...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Bad move. Shoulda led with that while you still had your pistol." {n}You manage to grab the beggar's weapon and turn it away from you. The two of you struggle for a time, grunting with the effort...{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hata ediyorsun. Bunu tabancan hâlâ elindeyken söyleyecektin." {n}Dilencinin silahını tutup uzağa çevirmeyi başarıyorsun. Bir süre boğuşuyorsunuz, dövüşüp homurdanıyorsunuz...{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain
